meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to stop (moving); to come to a stop そして、電車はキーッという音を立てて止まった。Then, the train screeched to a halt.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to stop (doing, working, being supplied); to come to a halt; to cease; to be stopped; to be suspended 十分な情報を受け取ることができなかったという理由も一部にはあって、ハーパーの描写は不完全なものにとどまっている。Partly because he could not receive enough information, Harper's description remains imperfect.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to alight; to perch on あの木の枝に数羽の鳥がとまっている。Some birds are sitting on the branch of that tree.
留まる 【とまる】、停まる 【とまる】、駐まる 【とまる】、止る 【とまる】、留る 【とまる】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to remain; to abide; to stay (in the one place) Usually written using kana aloneここにとどまっていても何の得もない。There is no advantage in staying here.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be limited to; to be confined to; to only account for Usually written using kana alone, See also 占める
留まる 【とどまる】、停まる 【とどまる】、駐まる 【とどまる】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to stop (moving); to come to a stop そして、電車はキーッという音を立てて止まった。Then, the train screeched to a halt.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to stop (doing, working, being supplied); to come to a halt; to cease; to be stopped; to be suspended 十分な情報を受け取ることができなかったという理由も一部にはあって、ハーパーの描写は不完全なものにとどまっている。Partly because he could not receive enough information, Harper's description remains imperfect.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to alight; to perch on あの木の枝に数羽の鳥がとまっている。Some birds are sitting on the branch of that tree.
留まる 【とまる】、停まる 【とまる】、駐まる 【とまる】、止る 【とまる】、留る 【とまる】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to remain; to abide; to stay (in the one place) Usually written using kana aloneここにとどまっていても何の得もない。There is no advantage in staying here.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be limited to; to be confined to; to only account for Usually written using kana alone, See also 占める

sentences.translation: Then, the train screeched to a halt.
Partly because he could not receive enough information, Harper's description remains imperfect.
Some birds are sitting on the branch of that tree.

meanings.meaning: 1. to stop; to turn off esp. 止める, 停めるその新聞は政府にインフレを止めるように求めた。The newspaper called for the government to stop inflation.
2. to park esp. 止める, 停めるここに車を停めるのは違法です。It's illegal to park your car here.
3. to prevent; to suppress (a cough); to hold back (tears); to hold (one's breath); to relieve (pain) esp. 止める, 停める
4. to stop (someone from doing something); to dissuade; to forbid; to prohibit この文書はあなたのお目にだけ留めていただきたい。This document is for your eyes only.
5. to notice; to be aware of; to concentrate on; to pay attention to; to remember; to bear in mind See also 目を留める, See also 気に留める
6. to fix (in place); to fasten; to tack; to pin; to nail; to button; to staple esp. 留める木片は１本の留め木で留めてある。The wooden pieces are fastened with a peg.
7. to detain; to keep in custody esp. 留める
留める 【とめる】、停める 【とめる】
1. to stop (an activity); to cease; to discontinue; to end; to quit Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to 止める, Only applies to 已める
2. to cancel; to abandon; to give up; to abolish; to abstain; to refrain Usually written using kana alone
已める 【やめる】、廃める 【やめる】
1. to stop; to turn off esp. 止める, 停めるその新聞は政府にインフレを止めるように求めた。The newspaper called for the government to stop inflation.
2. to park esp. 止める, 停めるここに車を停めるのは違法です。It's illegal to park your car here.
3. to prevent; to suppress (a cough); to hold back (tears); to hold (one's breath); to relieve (pain) esp. 止める, 停める
4. to stop (someone from doing something); to dissuade; to forbid; to prohibit この文書はあなたのお目にだけ留めていただきたい。This document is for your eyes only.
5. to notice; to be aware of; to concentrate on; to pay attention to; to remember; to bear in mind See also 目を留める, See also 気に留める
6. to fix (in place); to fasten; to tack; to pin; to nail; to button; to staple esp. 留める木片は１本の留め木で留めてある。The wooden pieces are fastened with a peg.
7. to detain; to keep in custody esp. 留める
留める 【とめる】、停める 【とめる】
1. to stop (an activity); to cease; to discontinue; to end; to quit Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to 止める, Only applies to 已める
2. to cancel; to abandon; to give up; to abolish; to abstain; to refrain Usually written using kana alone
已める 【やめる】、廃める 【やめる】

sentences.translation: The newspaper called for the government to stop inflation.
It's illegal to park your car here.
This document is for your eyes only.
The wooden pieces are fastened with a peg.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to cease; to stop; to be over
已む 【やむ】、罷む 【やむ】、熄む 【やむ】、歇む 【やむ】
已む: Rarely-used kanji form. 罷む: Rarely-used kanji form. 熄む: Rarely-used kanji form. 歇む: Rarely-used kanji form.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to cease; to stop; to be over
已む 【やむ】、罷む 【やむ】、熄む 【やむ】、歇む 【やむ】
已む: Rarely-used kanji form. 罷む: Rarely-used kanji form. 熄む: Rarely-used kanji form. 歇む: Rarely-used kanji form.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to stop (doing); to cease; to desist; to drop; to lay off; to give up; to quit Usually written using kana alone

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to stop (doing); to cease; to desist; to drop; to lay off; to give up; to quit Usually written using kana alone
1. cannot be helped; unavoidable
止むを得ない 【やむをえない】、已むを得ない 【やむをえない】
已むを得ない: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. cannot be helped; unavoidable
止むを得ない 【やむをえない】、已むを得ない 【やむをえない】
已むを得ない: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. clasp; latch; catch; fastener
止め金 【とめがね】、留金 【とめがね】、止金 【とめがね】
1. clasp; latch; catch; fastener
止め金 【とめがね】、留金 【とめがね】、止金 【とめがね】
1. to stop; to stay (e.g. the night); to cease; to put an end to
2. to contain; to keep (in position, in place); to limit 我々はあらゆる学校を運営させ続け、あらゆる教師を職にとどめておくべきです。We should keep every school open and every teacher in his job.
3. to record (e.g. a fact); to retain See also 記憶にとどめる彼の勇気は歴史に名をとどめた。His courage went down in history.
止める 【とどめる】、停める 【とどめる】

sentences.translation: We should keep every school open and every teacher in his job.
His courage went down in history.

meanings.meaning: 1. endlessly; ceaselessly Usually written using kana alone
止め処なく 【とめどなく】、止めど無く 【とめどなく】、止め処無く 【とめどなく】、とめど無く 【とめどなく】、留処無く 【とめどなく】

1. (a) stop (e.g. in a timber joint, or at the end of a kanji stroke) 例えば、ペパーバーグは緑色のもくせいの留めくぎと赤色の紙の三角形のような物体を見せる。For example, Pepperberg would show Alex an object, such as a green wooden peg or a red paper triangle.
2. remaining (e.g. poste-restante)
3. forty-five degree angle Only applies to 留め
止め 【とめ】

sentences.translation: For example, Pepperberg would show Alex an object, such as a green wooden peg or a red paper triangle.

meanings.meaning: 1. out of necessity; with no other option; perforce; unavoidably; reluctantly; unwillingly Usually written using kana alone
已む無く 【やむなく】、止むなく 【やむなく】、已むなく 【やむなく】
1. unavoidably; inevitably; necessarily; reluctantly; against one's will
止むを得ず 【やむをえず】、已むを得ず 【やむをえず】
1. stop on road signage, etc.
1. end; termination point
止め処 【とめど】、止処 【とめど】、留処 【とめど】
1. stop peg; toggle; tack しかし、彼は違った大きさや色の木製の留めくぎを見たことはあるかもしれない。He might, however, have seen a wooden peg of a different size or color.
留めくぎ 【とめくぎ】、止め釘 【とめくぎ】、留め釘 【とめくぎ】

sentences.translation: He might, however, have seen a wooden peg of a different size or color.

meanings.meaning: 1. unavoidably; inevitably; necessarily; reluctantly; against one's will Usually written using kana alone, See also 止むを得ず彼女はやむえず一人で行った。She reluctantly went by herself.
止む得ず 【やむえず】、已む得ず 【やむえず】
1. stop; stoppage; end
1. stopping at; going no further than See also 止まり とまりそんなんじゃいつまで経っても奨励賞止まりだぞ？With that sort of attitude you'll never get past the honourable-mention prizes.
止り 【どまり】、留まり 【どまり】、留り 【どまり】
1. stopping of bleeding; stanching; hemostasis; haemostasis
1. Itaru
1. Todomu
1. Tomaru
1. interruption; discontinuance; suspension; stoppage 暴風雨のため道路工事が中止された。Work on the road was suspended because of the storm.
2. cancellation (of a planned event); calling off 今日予定の会合は中止になりました。Today's meeting has been canceled.

sentences.translation: Work on the road was suspended because of the storm.

meanings.meaning: 1. prohibition; inhibition; ban

meanings.type: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. stoppage; coming to a stop; halt; standstill 列車は滑らかに停止した。The train came to a smooth stop.

meanings.type: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. ceasing (movement, activity, etc.); suspension (of operations); interruption (e.g. of electricity supply); cutting off コンピューター・システムは午後８時に自動的に停止する。The computer system shuts down automatically at 8pm.
3. suspension (of payment, a licence, etc.); (temporary) prohibition; ban 大統領は憲法を停止し、戒厳令をしきました。The President suspended the constitution and imposed martial law.
4. suspension of music, dance, etc. as a sign of mourning for a prominent person Archaic, Only applies to ちょうじ
停止 【ちょうじ】

sentences.translation: The train came to a smooth stop.
The computer system shuts down automatically at 8pm.
The President suspended the constitution and imposed martial law.

meanings.meaning: 1. prevention; check

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to stop (in one's tracks); to come to a stop; to halt; to pause; to stand still
立ち止る 【たちどまる】、立ちどまる 【たちどまる】、立止る 【たちどまる】、立ち留まる 【たちどまる】、立留まる 【たちどまる】、立留る 【たちどまる】、立ち止まる 【たちとまる】、立ち止る 【たちとまる】、立止る 【たちとまる】、立ち留まる 【たちとまる】、立留まる 【たちとまる】、立留る 【たちとまる】

1. to detain; to check; to restrain; to stop
引き留める 【ひきとめる】、引きとめる 【ひきとめる】、引止める 【ひきとめる】、引留める 【ひきとめる】
1. abolition; discontinuance; discontinuation; repeal; annulment
1. obstruction; prevention; hindrance; check; blocking; stopping
沮止 【そし】
沮止: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. to catch; to stop the blow
2. to react to; to take (advice, etc.); to accept; to come to grips with ・・・はぁ、どう状況を受け止めればいいのかしら。... Aaah, just how am I supposed to cope with this I wonder?
受けとめる 【うけとめる】

sentences.translation: ... Aaah, just how am I supposed to cope with this I wonder?

meanings.type: Noun, Suru verb, Intransitive verb, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. stillness; repose; standing still Antonym: 運動
1. to (call and) stop; to call (someone) to stop; to hail (e.g. a taxi)
呼びとめる 【よびとめる】、呼び留める 【よびとめる】、呼止める 【よびとめる】、呼留める 【よびとめる】
1. full stop; period

2. end See also 終止符を打つ移住者の部落が野蛮人によって征服され、移住者の希望も生活も土壇場にきた時、長い歳月をかけての不幸とのたたかいに終止符がうたれた。Years of resistance to misfortune ended when the settlers' village was overcome by the savages and their hopes and lives came to the bitter end.
3. Full stop A full stop (. ) or period is the punctuation mark common... Read more

sentences.translation: Years of resistance to misfortune ended when the settlers' village was overcome by the savages and their hopes and lives came to the bitter end.
